website_summaries.verdict: Consider the Sony HT-CT550W if you need a sound bar with a lot of connectivity, but it's otherwise not worth its premium price.
pros: The Sony HT-CT550W is packed with more connectivity than your average sound bar, with three HDMI inputs and three digital audio inputs
The sound bar itself feels surprisingly well-made, with a stylish, refined look
cons: Unlike other budget sound bars, the HT-CT550W requires a separate head unit, which vitiates some of the benefits of a minimalist sound bar system in the first place
And although it's priced at a premium, its sound quality is not as good as that of other budget competitors
Also, the included remote is very complicated for a relatively basic device

customer_reviews.title: OK product, great bass, mediocre speakers whose wires are giving out.
customer_reviews.text: ound quality is decent but the 3d effect is virtually non-existent. I have in the past year started to have major wiring issues with the speaker. This is probably due in part to the fact that I move the speaker around a lot (I have this setup in my kitchen but will move the speaker around the deck door outside) so now it keeps cutting in and out of 1 or 2 speakers playing in the bar which is mostly annoying due to the volume changes and lack of sound consistency. That being said, the bass is pretty excellent overall i would say save a little extra $$ and buy yourself a real system.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: it is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: i actually bought this more than a year ago and i still love it. it is worth for what i paid. wireless woofer is so good (rather adjusting a bit lower indeed). wireless transmission is clear, no delays or cuts. only unhappy thing is that sometimes auto genre selector isn't properly picking. like when i'm wathing a mp4 or flv movie wirelessly transmitted to tv from my laptop, it is not recognized as movie, so "standard" is automatically selected. i can manually change the genre but when i see multiple files continuously, it switches back to standard each time. rather than this, i'm happy i bought a good one.
customer_reviews.author: septrebob257

customer_reviews.title: Sony HTCT550W 3D Sound Bar Home Theater System with Wireless Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: Although the HTCT550W does not perform as well as my 7.1 surround system, it is not designed to do so. That said, it does exactly what I was expecting and maybe even a little more. Adjusting the base, treble, and subwoofer are easy. I did have some difficulty with the set up in order to make the Bravia Sync work properly but once the right connections were made, it was great. For anyone looking for a rather easy system to use for a small room like a den, etc., this system is just right. The 3d surround sound is not at all bad and when used with the subwoofer, very good considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Coliwabl

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality Sound Bar for The Price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a christmas gift for my parents. The design was well done (it all flows together, very square, hard lined elements in a matte black finish), the sound was sub-par because the subwoofer stopped working (we don't know exactly when). The subwoofer is also very large, but again, the design is nice enough that it isn't terrible to place under something, but it's cumbersome. Especially when re-arranging. I would not repurchase or recommend this, but I do not regret purchasing it as a first-sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: mwayne

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the integration to the Sony Bravia television. The sound is much better than the built in speakers and the bass really rumbles. The sound bar is not true surround but sound good anyway. One downside to this unit is mounting options. I mounted mine to the top of the television with this:. The brackets aren't the best but they work. You need to adjust the settings on the receiver to get the best sound for your room. Once I adjusted mine I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pounds

customer_reviews.title: The sound reproduction is good/really good, and the sub woofer can put out some ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a solid soundbar and subwoofer. I have a large apartment and consistently have to turn down the volume and bass so I don't bother the neighbors. The sound reproduction is good/really good, and the sub woofer can put out some bass. Disaster movies, Action moviesall are more enjoyable by bringing some of that low vibrating bass. And since it syncs with my Sony KDL TV, the volume is easy to change and I can run my chromecast straight from the back HDMI. I also like how if I only want to use the TV speakers I can, as it has an HDMI pass through. This has been a solid addition to my entertainment set up.
customer_reviews.author: JustinRose

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker system!
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, I was hopeful this speaker system would live up the promise. Well, thankfully I can say that the Sony speaker system has been an excellent addition to my living room entertainment center. I was looking for a low-profile speaker bar with wireless sub-woofer, and this system seemed to best fit that criteria. Setup was extremely simple (took more time to unpack than to set up) and the speakers look great! The sound it unbelievably crisp and the base is great. I placed the subwoofer in the back of the room which seems counter to many of the recommendations, but I'm more than pleased with it. I HIGHLY recommend this system!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soundbar. I bought this about a year and a half ago and have no issues. Easy setup, convenient wireless subwoofer and great sound. I have used this in a basement and in a living room and works great in both. I spent a month researching and testing soundbars and came to the conclusion that this was the best value. I very rarely dislike or return a product, because I spend a great deal of time researching and patiently waiting for price drops. I look for the best value for my situation. Trust me when I say this is your best deal ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Cuttito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple solution that works extremely well even with ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, simple solution that works extremely well with a new Sony 4k TV. Pass through works perfectly with Sony's latest model 3D Blu-Ray player and PlayStation 4. Listen with the TV speakers or the sound system. The BDP and PS4 play with no issues and, if you turn the sound system on, it automatically recognizes and tunes to its profile for the device that's in use. It's an excellent central component of a Sony sound and entertainment system.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system to substitute for the poor quality speakers built into the XBR TV I placed in my large, high-ceiling family room. It delivers good sound and does a reasonable job at mimicking surround sound. It is certainly much better than the TV's built-in speakers. The bass is much improved as well as the conversational sounds. I especially like the wireless capability of the subwoofer. I also think I was given a good price by Amazon, and it was shipped in a reasonable time frame (though not fast).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Janik

customer_reviews.title: Great surround sound from this system.
customer_reviews.text: Surround sound is exceptional, definitely the best bang for the buck of any systems I listened to before this purchase. I enjoy being able to select among a variety of sound fields depending on what type of program I'm watching (e.g. sports, news, movie, etc.). I bought this before the Sonos soundbar was released. I probably would go with a Sonos soundbar today as I already have about 10 Sonos speakers throughout the house, but I am certainly not disappointed with this Sony system.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Shady

customer_reviews.title: sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound of this speaker set a lot. It sounds great and the presets work well. I don't find it too boomy or too thin. The controls are out of date. The old LCD display could use an update. The only thing I don't like about this machine is that every time the input source changes, it defaults back to the TV setting, even though I use Line In. So, every time I turn on the TV or switch between TV and video game, I have to change the setting to Line In because it will default back to TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bell Ringer

customer_reviews.title: great sound and flexible sub-woofer placement
customer_reviews.text: great sound and you can put the sub-woofer anywhere you want (i recommend behind the couch if possible). i use this with my Xbox one and it works with the Xbox one "power on" functionality ( if you are unaware what that is it just means you can set it up to where the xbone powers on the receiver for the sound system when you power on the xbox or turning the xbox off it'll turn the receiver off).
customer_reviews.author: Erik Endicott

customer_reviews.title: Definitely love the sound from the bar
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love the sound from the bar. My only complaint is more about sound bars in general... even though they give you many choices of EQs (sports, news, drama, music, etc) sometimes dialogue can be hard to hear unless you crank the sound way up. But the quality is excellent. I love how the room shakes with the bass when I have it cranked and am playing XB1 or watching Hannibal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I checked out several sound bar systems before selecting this one. I have to say that the price was what cinched the deal. The price on Amazon was lower than anywhere else for this system or similar systems. I wanted to get a sony system since I knew I'd have no compatablity issues with the sony HD television which I purchased the previous year. Set up was easy and smooth with no problems at all. It took about 30 minutes. I spent more time removing my old surround sound system. The system looks good and the sound quality is above average but not anything over the top. All in all, I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not bad for price...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt say the sound is awesome with all caps, but it works for what it is. The receiver works well and the media link to your other media devices is perfect for all your sony stuff (and works with my sharp tv also). Again, sound is good but not great. It is clear but sounds almost shallow rather than round and robust. Still worth it in the end though...
customer_reviews.author: Mace Lando

customer_reviews.title: Still works awesome with thundering sound
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 5 years. Still works awesome with thundering sound. Best Sony purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar S

customer_reviews.title: Flawless upgrade to my Sony 3D TV
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar was a perfect addition to my Sony 3D television, the soundbar is thin and powerful. My television is placed in my living room and I have a high ceiling so I was very surprised in the quality of the sound. It all comes down to adjusting the bass/treble to the correct settings, for bigger rooms I suggest having your treble at +3 to +4 and the bass to +2. Setup was easy, look is very clean. This item is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my husband to go with our Sony bluray player, and I knew my husband would want an easy setup with as little wires as possible. The setup was very easy. We have a large living room and this still fills the room. The sound quality is top notch and the subwoofer is fantastic. What a great purchase. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE CARSON

customer_reviews.title: The SONY sound bar is received and being used in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I preferred to buy only Bose digital sound equipment, but when I saw the latest and compact sound bar from Sony, I went in to buy it. Now in as much as I have installed and using it regularly, I feel it very comfortable. Lovely music from the sound bar is filling all the walls of my room which i enjoy most! I would not hesitate to recommend this lovely product to those who really like the best music at its peak!
customer_reviews.author: Sundareshwaran V

customer_reviews.title: EPIC 2.1 SONY 3D SURROUND SOUND !!!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Sony 7.1 to this awesome Sony 2.1 I got it like like new but more like used from Amazon for my 60" Sony lx900 3dtv 240HZ. soundbar is awesome & loud sounds like a 5.1. Sub is powerful & nice. Sound from cable Tv is great. But from Ps3 & blu-ray with 3D ON IS WHERE THIS 2.1 BECOMES EPIC... DTS HD & DDHD = 5.1 3D SOUNDBAR...IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: LUKE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, as long as you use HDMI 1.4
customer_reviews.text: I was about to pack this unit up and return it to Amazon. The sound was weak and nothing I could do in the settings came close to making it even remotely tolerable. As a last ditch effort, I followed the advice in another review and bought a "high speed with ethernet" HDMI cable and instantly got what you'd expect from $300 speakers. I had been using an older HDMI cable that I bought a few years back and never thought to question it since the video quality was stellar. Makes you wonder how many of the bad reviews here are simply because they were using older, lower bandwidth cables.
customer_reviews.author: Flubin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I got rid of my surround sound stereo with numerous wires going everywhere (at my wife's request). I've really been pleased with this sound bar. When just watching TV, we only use the sound bar, but when watching movies, we turn on the sub woofer which gives a lot of power & sound. This is a good quality sound bar & well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Looked forever  for this unit
customer_reviews.text: Has not work properly since I bought it. Really haven't used it much. It plays like I expected and pleased with that WHEN it plays. I found that I need to unplug the unit for a while (days) and then it works great until I try to use it again a few days later. Unplug, replug and then it works fine.....most of the time AFTER the plug ritual.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous buying this as I took a chance and bought it used to save some money. This was a $400 +tax system at Best Buy. Amazon stated it had a small scratch on the bottom of speaker bar but I couldn't find it anywhere! The unit arrived well packaged and in excellent condition if not brand new! Setup was simple and it sounds damn good! Glad I bought it, thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Canampatriot

customer_reviews.title: Sony HTCT550W 3D Sound Bar Home Theater System
customer_reviews.text: I have only tested this unit with a CD and have not had time to use a Blue-ray disc to really put it to the test. I am very pleased with it though. I did find the Sub-woofer to be somewhat lacking. I also found the menu when you have to go to adjust various things like the sub-woofer to be very difficult to use. Therefore I am only giving the product a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Coelho

customer_reviews.title: This blows me away
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded my tv to a Sony hx850 and got this with it. The setup is super easy, HDMI cable and a digital cable. Put the sub wherever you want as long as you have an outlet nearby. The sound is amazing! I am hearing movies the way they were meant to be heard. I also enjoy the built in tuner.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Reinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a year now, and no problems
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Toates Mcgoats worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great bass, great price! I would recommend this product for anyone looking to upgrade their old or stock tv speakers. Bass hits HARD, rattles the pots in my kitchen! Lol great for any gamer or movie enthusiast. Multiple settings and adjustments, great for mid to large rooms (you get more of the "3D" sound in a larger room)
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound bar system that also multiplexes my Blu -Ray, Cable DVR and LG player , good performance for 400W system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound bar system with separate control head unit that also multiplexes my Sony Blu -Ray, Cable DVR and LG TV , good performance for a 400W system . My family room had no space for full 5.1 or 7.1 surround system. This sound bar System fills the 20x20ft room - bass is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Mike 27513

customer_reviews.title: great for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Keeping in mind that this is not a surround sound system, it does a great job for a sound bar. I almost did not purchase it after hearing some of the new versions of sony sound bars. This sound bar has a much wider sound, although not as wide as some that I've heard. That is what brought me to the 4 star. In its price class, it is definitely the top runner. With a little tweaking the sound is great. Would definitely suggest this for someone with a smaller room and looking for pretty good sound. Not for an audio perfectionist, not meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: brent BAKER

customer_reviews.title: Good Sony Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to support my Sony 3D tv. I know there are newer versions, but I like the separate amp better than the amp built into the soundbar. Sound is good and this system works great with my sony tv and Playstation. Too bad Sony doesn't make systems like these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: i had better expections about this product it doesnt have enough volume like they claim it will not pair with HDMI ARC input i am using it through audio input mode which by the way gives you an inferior sound ***
customer_reviews.author: jrf

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Has plenty of volume and am happy with the sound. Set up was easy with a Sony TV, and nice because the TV automatically recognizes the external speakers when you turn it on. Didn't really notice too much of an improvement with the different sound modes, so I end up leaving it in standard mode most of the time. Happy with my purchase, and would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade their sound system without adding too many components. Definitely not the same as a full surround system, but I wasn't really looking for that either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing system, never had any type of issue! Would buy again if available!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound bar just to get a little better quality sound for my new tv. When I set everything up and turned it on for the first time, I was blown away at the sound quality and clarity I was hearing. Even at full volume, the clarity was incredible. The wireless subwoofer sounds great and looks great. Extremely easy set up to any tv, especially if you have a Sony Bravia tv or other Sony devices (I.E. Blue ray player, Playstation) I would recommend this sound bar to anyone who wants that high quality sound that won't leave a hole in your wallet
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. I love that the bass is wireless so I can put it anywhere and not have to worry about wires. Thus is one of the few models that had a tuner so I could replace my whole sound system
customer_reviews.author: David Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful bass and clean highs. Probably best for a smaller room since you're only getting a sound bar and sub woofer, but power and sound are great. Good product from a reputable company. I'm pleased to say the least. I have this setup in my bedroom (20' X 20') and it sounds great. I only go up to 25% when I want it LOUD...
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Regarding the product, my son-in-law, Stephen was the one who found this deal on the net. Since we have a Sony TV, he recommended we get a Sony Sound Bar to insure compatibility. When he hooked it up, it sounded great. And he did it in a way so we needed to use only one remote. As for the purchase experience, we were very pleased with that as well. We got a good deal and the product came in earlier than expected. Thank you Stephen and thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VB Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Sony HTC550W 3D Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: The system set up easily enough. It was easy to program and I love the sound produced. I connected it to the Sony XBR 950 55" 3D tv in my bedroom. Now, I enjoy the best theater sound effects. Tried it with Avatar in HD. Let us just say that I won't trade it for any other out there. Price is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: IanT

customer_reviews.title: Good sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar works great and sounds great. It was easy to set-up. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because we have Comcast HD cable and sometimes the picture will not display on our TV unless we turn on the sound bar to resend the signal. The way the sound bar is set-up all HD cables go through the sound bar and it acts as a switch. I am unsure if this is a problem with our cable box or the sound bar itself but it can sometimes be annoying. However, it's a great value for the price and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenay Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Sound Bar of Sound Bars
customer_reviews.text: Great product finish. Sounds a little thin though. The receiver box hard to read whether it is on or off or volume level, but otherwise, sound acceptable. All Sony products, including Blue Ray have these LED lights that are white on a black background that is not very distinguished.
customer_reviews.author: PP the Amazon Man

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, very impressed
customer_reviews.text: There are a few key points that made me rate this sound bar system 5 stars: - Plenty of configuration options. I'm sure that if you spend enough time, no matter who you are, you can find the sweet spot exactly the way you want it. - Ease of setup. It took me maybe 15 minutes to read through forums and setup the best-sounding configuration to my liking. I read several reviews that said the sound was flat and hollow like a tin can, but I found the opposite to be true once you properly set it up to your specifications. - The sound is simply powerful while remaining clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brett K

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The soundbar and subwoofer definitely enhance the Sony 55" TV! It is a real joy to listen to The Voice or X Factor as well as movies. The sound really fills the room and gives it dimension. Very satisfied and easy enough to connect.
customer_reviews.author: always striving

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected and more.....
customer_reviews.text: Got a new sony Tv that would only fit in the Family Room if it were Kitty Corner. Once it was in place I realized my 5.1 surround system wasnt going to work with my room setup......Like most reviews say, it no 5.1 but it sounds great! Threw in Transformers Dark side of the Moon Blu Ray and forgot all about my old system in about 15 Min Ive had it for about 3 months now.....Good product Great for listening to Slacker and Pandora too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound that these speakers delivers was better than expected. I would say that for the price point, this system can't be beat. I live in a condo so my space was small and I couldn't install a surround sound easily. This did the trick and I am more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sony makes the best sound quality products ever
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on this .will keep me Steady for a long time before I upgrade to anything else
customer_reviews.author: Joshua leal

customer_reviews.title: really great system
customer_reviews.text: i have had this system for about a 2 weeks. it sounds great and looks really sharp. i can feel the bass all the way in the back of the house when i crank it up. setup was easy but like with any new toy you have to figure out how to use the functions on it but an easy learning curve. i have my xbox360 and ps4 hooked up to it. there is a little pause when you turn the system on and when you here sound but its not bad if you turn it on with your tv.
customer_reviews.author: anthony davis

customer_reviews.title: Half the inputs don't work!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds great, but only 2 of the HDMI inputs work on it. Pretty upset considering how much I paid for this thing. I definitely will never buy a Sony sound bar system again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: quill

customer_reviews.title: Sony HTCT550W
customer_reviews.text: I'm big into audio and video and normally don't leave reviews, but the system is great. I recently moved and had a 5.1 surround sound system. The living room had no place for the rear speakers so I decided to give the Sony Soundbar a try. It's excellent. Blu-Rays sound excellent. The sub woofer is very powerful. It does a good job of simulating the surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Silva

customer_reviews.title: Midrange lacking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sound bar to enhance the sound of the TV speakers. While it did give a nice bass, the midrange was noticeably lacking. Since this range of sound was what I was most interested in, I returned the unit as it did not meet my expectations. Amazon, without questions, credited my account minus the shipping cost as they said the return was not due to there error.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rawe

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar met all our expectations except one - the remote does not sync up with our RCA TV. If we had a Sony TV it would have, but as it is we have to use the remote for TV and the soundbar back and forth. We can only mute the TV or change volume by using the soundbar remote which is a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Worked well with my set up. High quality, good sounds, easy setup. Ideal for those who don't want hundreds of speakers laying around and a bunch of wires. I would buy again..
customer_reviews.author: DoDo

customer_reviews.title: Sony Soundbar system review
customer_reviews.text: The delivery time was great. Packaged securely and worked well out of the box. We were satisfied and the unit performed per the other reviews we read and has added to the enjoyment of the quality of our 55" Sony TV picture. Really like the ability to put the base unit in different areas for trial. The wireless feature has worked very well. We sync'ed the controls and the sound system works with the main Cable controller.
customer_reviews.author: Caveman

customer_reviews.title: hummm
customer_reviews.text: got this for my new TV. easy to hook up but was disappointed. there are few preset sound settings but it's rally hard to hear the voice on all hd movies. was expecting much better sound settings. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: Better then factory for not a ton of money for a basic setup
customer_reviews.text: descent sound for a two piece system, with the benefit of wireless sub. Definite upgrade from the factory speaker built into the TV
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed - Great sound system
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in a sound system. We have it linked to a projector in a bonus room that is 15x22'. The sound bar fills the room giving us a "theater like" experience with a very simple system.
customer_reviews.author: dc93

customer_reviews.title: Nice little system
customer_reviews.text: This little system plays just fine for no more money than it cost. I just have a problem with turning it off. The only way it will turn off is to unplug it from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: carriesmom5871

customer_reviews.title: Delivers tons of features and punch at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Used to have a BOSE 123 that cost about $1k. THIS little setup delivers tons of features and punch at a fraction of the BOSE's pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: Regent T. St Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first after reading the mixed reviews on this sound bar. I'm very happy I took a chance and purchased it. It sounds amazing. A lot of people said the bass wasn't the best but I think it sounds awesome. Setup was extremely easy. I used only HDMI cords to hook everything up. I also used the settings LDB recommended in their review. It is a great buy for the quality / price.
customer_reviews.author: Millah

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL SOUND
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING FEATURES, BASS IS INCREDIBLE AND THE CLARITY OF THE SOUNDBAR IS IMPRESSIVE. I this model and another and both remotes works with each other. The remote that comes with this one could have came smaller like my other model but overall, an amazing MOVIE system.
customer_reviews.author: G Note

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic system, amazing sound, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy too install and amazing sound. This is my first sound bar system , and it is superb. I would recommend it to anyone the quality of the sound is really great. It has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Goldenberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It is specifically designed for the sony tvs. But the bass is not so great just acceptably so. And there are a measly THREE inputs to the hdmi back of the head unit. I'd rather have a real subwoofer but very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good (a step up from my stock TV speakers) but it really is a pain to switch between inputs. I really thought a separate receiver would not be that big of a deal, but as it turns out it complicates the setup. My word of advice is to look elsewhere for a non-complicated setup with decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Sony because I have Sony TV and Blu ray player. Works extremely well and I am very pleased with the systm.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stereo for small apartments
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive but this soundbar provides a unique interpretation of surround sound. Once you get used to it, it's incredible and the "wireless" subwoofer is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good, display dim otherwise Great
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because the controllers display on the is dim and from across the room you cannot see it clearly. I love everything else about it, sound performance and appearance are great.
customer_reviews.author: G.Ler

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 6 months ago to pair with a new Sony TV. I've been very happy with the overall function, ease of set up and performance of this system. The wireless subwoofer was the only choice for us due to our room set up. It was easy to install and hasn't let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: GJP

customer_reviews.title: Sony Did It Again
customer_reviews.text: To make this review very simple I'll only say this: You will not find a home theater system that sounds this good at this price PERIOD
customer_reviews.author: Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good features, sound quality is Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is not an audio device that a true audiophile would love. It produces slightly above average sound, but does offer great features and is easy to use. For the price, it is a good value. If you're looking for a true movie theater experience, you'll need to spend more on a high-end sound bar or 5.1 or 7.1 HTIB/component system.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K.

customer_reviews.title: Sony 3D home th. sys
customer_reviews.text: Nice small compact great sound and an amazing subwhoofer, a little hard to set up as far as programming but sets up in a flash!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great home theater sound for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up with my flat screen TV, and the wireless subwoofer made it so easy to place it where I needed it to be without have to run wires.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fair, bass is wanting. Hardly know there is a sub attached. Weak bass.
customer_reviews.author: pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound...nice deep soft bass and easy to adjust from news, to sports, or movies etc. Easy to mount. All in all a great product from Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Cutting

customer_reviews.title: great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: first time reviewing an item, and after a lot of reading i went and bought the ct550w. let me say with a few tweaks bass @ 3 treb @ 6 AND sub 3 and the sound bar bangs, ok not like a real 5.1 but for the 230 bucks i spent cant get any better then this.. good job sony.....
customer_reviews.author: topdog347

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds great. I just wish the standard speaker was wireless too. The subwoofer will rattle your teeth if you set it up right.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: The sound from this little setup really surprised me. The bass and lack of distortion at volume are great. Setup was easy. No complaints at all. And as usual, Amazon shipping was FAST !! Ordered on a Sunday, had the soundbar on Wednesday !! I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kraggman

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for about a year and a half, it has stopped working. About 3 months ago I had to move it around for the picture and sound to continue to come through. After months of fidgeting with it, it finally just stopped transmitting the signal to my TV. HIGHLY disappointed with this. I read bad reviews before, but didn't think it would happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmith98

customer_reviews.title: Sony sound system
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality for the price. Looked at the bose system, but could not justify the price. Easy to connect and work with our samsung or sony tv.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Romanski

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no issues with set up. Sounds great. Wireless subwoofer has no issues receiving signals all the way across the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wood

customer_reviews.title: Sony does it again!
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is excellent. The wireless sub makes everything even better! Highly recommend for any sports/gaming/movie fanatic. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CJ_Sandman1029

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get rid of five speakers a lot of wires. Sounds better then the six speaker system I had. Really fills the room with sound.
customer_reviews.author: antonio genovesi

customer_reviews.title: Better than TV's sound.
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from it. The sound is kind of cheap. It is better though than the sound coming from the TV. I adjusted the settings and it didn't improve much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nelms

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good, great value for money and very convenient wireless subwoofer for different choice of placement, if u're a fan of heavy bass look for one with more wattage
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Renwick

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze. The sound is decent. Would like to have more depth in the bass. One annoyance I have is when the receiver goes into sleep mode, I have to turn it back on and manually switch to the input I am using. I can't find a way to change the default input.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Sony 3D sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect sound system. Meets all my needs with my TV & games. A great investment .I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Vinseck

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Wireless Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Adds great sound to our minimal setup and the wireless sub is easy to locate in any spot. I wish the LED front panel display were a little more readible from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Love the HDMI pass through. Sometimes voices are still hard to hear, but for the price it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: This system was very easy to hook up with my 55" Sony television. The sound is a definite improvement compared to the TV speakers. The room is mid-sized and the sound is sufficient. I need to do some adjustments to improve the sound quality but all in all this is a very nice system for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Joel DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup , one remote for switching between our Roku, DVD player Cable TV . The audio is quite good too.
customer_reviews.author: L & J

customer_reviews.title: Good Option
customer_reviews.text: Sound is much improved over the TV and it's nice to be able to use this device as an HDMI hub since it has 3 inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Greg V

customer_reviews.title: 3d sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Didn' t work, refurbished item did not work with remote. It would work sometimes manually pushing the buttons on the console
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple setup. Works flawlessly with my bravia sony tv and sony bluray. Excellent sound quality. Great transaction, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Robsolo

customer_reviews.title: great sound, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted better sound for my plasma TV, but didn't want wires everywhere. The sound is great, and the wireless subwoofer really adds some depth to anything I am watching. Sound is great, simple set-up, and the price is fair. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: opie

customer_reviews.title: My First SoundBar
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it works great with the Sony TV and Blu-Ray DVD. The only issue I had was finding sufficient space for the receiver. Big improvement over the TV speakers. Discontinued model but still a quality product purchased at a great price. Bonus FM radio too!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R Klaner

customer_reviews.title: Trumps tv speakers
customer_reviews.text: Middle of the pack pricewise...performs as advertised. Expands flat screen speaker sound to make tv listening more enjoyable and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best sound bar systems out there. It is OK for surroundish kinda sound. It is no where near a true 5.1 set though.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. Donelson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound was most impressive right out of the box. I had to adjust the base sound down somewhat for the room size. The result was a "theater like" atmosphere. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Unless I'm doing something wrong, it only makes the tv connected to it louder, and doesn't create the theatre surround effect that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase as it completes my entertainment system. I highly recommend using the settings listed in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Laconic 1

product_meta.title: Sony HTCT550W 3D Sound Bar Home Theater System with Wireless Subwoofer (Discontinued by Manufacturer),Black
product_meta.description:
Powerful sound and an easy-to-place wireless subwoofer distinguish the Sony HT-CT550 sound bar. Three HDMI inputs offer flexibility and future-proof with 3D pass-through. Easy operating features include BRAVIA Sync unified control3 and BRAVIA Widget4 on-screen interface with compatible Sony televisions. HDMI standby pass-through and Audio Return Channel1 are also included.what's in the box: Sony HT-CT550W0 40 Inch 3D Sound Bar System, Remote Control: (RM-AAU113), Receiver (STR-CT550WT), FM Wire Antenna (aerial), Operating Instructions, Subwoofer (SA-WCT550W), 8.2 feet (2.5 m) Digital Optical Cord for TV, Speaker (SS-CT550W), 4 x Speaker Foot Pads, Wireless Transceivers (EZW-RT50), 2 x AA Batteries and 1 Year Parts & Labor Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY HTCT550W 3D SOUND BAR HOME THEATER SYSTEM WITH WIRELESS SUBWOOFER

 * 
 * 2.1 ch 400W (133w x 2 + 134w) simulated surround sound system for 40-inch and above HDTV6 
 * 
 * Wireless active subwoofer for flexible placement
 * 
 * Three HDMI inputs: single-cable AV connections1
   
 * 
 * HDMI Repeater with 3D pass-through
   
 * Dolby TrueHD and dts HD enhanced audio codecs5
 * 3D Surround Sound (S-Force Pro Front Surround 3D)
 * BRAVIA Widget unified on-screen interface4
 * Audio Return Channel: just one cable for TV audio1
 * HDMI standby pass-through when system is off
 * BRAVIA Sync multi-device control with one remote3
 * 
















Experience powerful sound and an easy-to-place wireless subwoofer with the Sony HTCT550W 3D Sound Bar Home Theater System. Three HDMI inputs offer flexibility and future-proof with 3D pass-through. Easy operating features include BRAVIA Sync unified control3 and BRAVIA Widget4 on-screen interface with compatible Sony televisions. Also included are HDMI standby pass-through and Audio Return Channel1. 



KEY FEATURES
2.1-CHANNEL SOUND BAR

The fast and easy way to add great sound to any HDTV, this sound bar matches the design of Sony® televisions and is the perfect complement for 40-inch and larger televisions1.


WIRELESS SUBWOOFER

Place the subwoofer just about anywhere in the room. With Sony’s input/output box enables the sound bar to offer both a wireless subwoofer and HDMI connections to other equipment1.


THREE HDMI INPUTS

Connect three HD sources via HDMI and easily switch between them1. HDMI connections combine the quality of pure digital-to-digital signal transfer with the simplicity of a single connection for audio, video and control.


HDMI 3D PASS-THROUGH

With the Sony HTCT550W, you can enjoy 3D Blu-ray Disc movies, video games and other 3D content with compatible players and HDTVs2.


DOLBY TRUEHD AND DTS MASTER AUDIO5

Experience theater-like sound in your home with Dolby TrueHD and dts Master Audio HD enhanced audio5.


3D SURROUND SOUND

Using Sony’s S-Force Surround technology, the HT-CT550W can deliver simulated surround sound from just the bar and the subwoofer. You get a powerful surround sound effect without the need to connect multiple speakers throughout the room. 


BRAVIA WIDGET CONTROL4

Easily control your sound bar. With select 2011 BRAVIA HDTVs, you can pull up a menu on the TV screen to make comprehensive audio adjustments4.

400 WATTS FOR POWERFUL SOUND

Hear everything with incredible impact. The sound bar delivers 400 Watts total power (133 W x 2 +134 W)6.

AUDIO RETURN CHANNEL1
Eliminate the need for extra cables connected to your TV. Send audio from a compatible TV to the sound bar through the same HDMI cable already being used to send audio and video to your TV1. 

HDMI STANDBY PASS-THROUGH
Conveniently access all your HDMI sources without having to power on the sound bar.1

BRAVIA SYNC CAPABLE
Easily control an entire system with one remote. Operates Sony equipment connected via HDMI cables, including compatible Blu-ray Disc players, BRAVIA HDTVs, Handycam camcorders and Cybershot digital cameras.3  * 
 * 


PRODUCT DIMENSIONS
Amplifier Features: 
S-Force PRO Front Surround 3D: YES; Type: Digital
Video Features: 
1080/24p: YES
1080p: YES 
A/V SYNC: YES(Fixed)
A/V Sync Time(msec): ON(70ms)/OFF 
Decoding Formats:
96k/24Bit PCM: YES; DTS 96/24: YES; DTS HD/DolbyTruHD/Dolby Digital+: YES/YES/YES Inputs and Outputs:
Analog Audio In(Inc TV CEC)/Out(excl. tuner)/TV(CEC): Single Line In
Coax.: 1 Input
HDMI In/Out : (Front input): 3 In / 1 Out 
Opt. In/Out/TV(CEC) : incl Front input & TV (CEC): 2 In Weight and Measurements:
Approx: Center Speaker (WxHxD): 37 3/8in x 3in x 1 5/8in

1. Requires HDMI® cables sold sep.
2. Requires 3D content, 3D HDTV, 3D glasses, 3D emitter, and HDMI® cable (at least 10.2 Gbps).
3. Syncs with BRAVIA® Sync or Theatre Sync products.
4. BRAVIA Widget unified control can be used only when receiver is connected to a Sony XBR-EX620, EX630, EX720, EX820, EX830, NX830, HX820, HX830, or HX930 series BRAVIA HDTV via HDMI® cable (sold separately).
5. Requires HDMI® cable and LPCM capable source device.
6. Measurements at 4 ohms, 180 Hz -20 kHz with a THD of 1%

Wireless active subwoofer for flexible placement
Three HDMI inputs: single-cable AV connections
Dolby TrueHD and dts HD enhanced audio codecs
